title: Corrode
description: Francis Beaufort - FamineThey say you shouldn’t hoard your wealth.Those people know nothing of the power it brings.Drake, West, Prescott and I are untouchable.The men known as the Four Horsemen.Gods ruling over our kingdom.There are some secrets in this world greater than others. Our fifth was going to find that out the hard way.Scarlett thought she knew why she’d come back, but she had no idea what lay in the dark recesses of her memories.It started when we returned her to our sides. When we let desire fuel our needs. And it will end when the truth comes to light.A dark why choose (MFMMM) contemporary retelling of the four horsemen of the apocalypse set in Sarah Bailey's Dark Universe with cliffhangers and a HEA in the final book.This is a DARK romance and therefore comes with a content warning. Please see the author's website for full details.
author: Sarah    Bailey
